channel.title: Comments on: Advan RS / RZ with Toyo R888

item.title: By: fd3ssh
item.dc:creator: fd3ssh
item.description:
Hi Is the front a normal fender ?
I'm going to buy Advan RZ 9.5J +30 or 9J +35.Tire size is 255/40 17.
item.content:encoded:
Hi
Is the front a normal fender ?

I’m going to buy Advan RZ 9.5J +30 or 9J +35.Tire size is 255/40 17.

item.title: By: Rick
item.dc:creator: Rick
item.description:
I keep looking to your club build thread and forget to check here for updates.
The Works looked good, the Regamasters looked great, but I love the new wheels! You can't go wrong with Advans on an FD. And I didn't initially notice the RS/RZ combo, very nice touch.
Do you track your FD? The R888's should feel phenomenal.
I also like the reversion to the USDM bumper.
Keep up the great work Eric!
item.content:encoded:
I keep looking to your club build thread and forget to check here for updates.

The Works looked good, the Regamasters looked great, but I love the new wheels! You can’t go wrong with Advans on an FD. And I didn’t initially notice the RS/RZ combo, very nice touch.

Do you track your FD? The R888’s should feel phenomenal.

I also like the reversion to the USDM bumper.

Keep up the great work Eric!

item.title: By: In Anticipation | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: In Anticipation | Grand Mighty
item.description: […] the Advans, wheel changes are going to be a lot more tedious now. The lug holes on these wheels are super deep […]
item.content:encoded: […] the Advans, wheel changes are going to be a lot more tedious now. The lug holes on these wheels are super deep […]

item.title: By: Jake
item.dc:creator: Jake
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/08/advan-rs-rz-with-toyo-r888/#comment-68987">Eric</a>.
Thanks for info. Change of plans. Found local rotary mechanic. Going to take it up to ~375whp. Will need more aggressive wheel tire. Went with Works CR 18 x 8.5 and 18.9.5. Going to run 888 275 35 rear and 245 front. Build starts this week. Will post pics soon. Looking for Efini 99' or so front bumper - love style - either without license plate holder or someone tell me how others are deleting/shaving it off. TKS
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eric.

Thanks for info. Change of plans. Found local rotary mechanic. Going to take it up to ~375whp. Will need more aggressive wheel tire. Went with Works CR 18 x 8.5 and 18.9.5. Going to run 888 275 35 rear and 245 front. Build starts this week. Will post pics soon. Looking for Efini 99′ or so front bumper – love style – either without license plate holder or someone tell me how others are deleting/shaving it off.
TKS

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/08/advan-rs-rz-with-toyo-r888/#comment-68972">Jake</a>.
Sounds like a great pick up! Got any pictures and care to share where you found it?
Yes, car is lowered. That's a little over 24.5" floor-to-fender all around.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jake.

Sounds like a great pick up! Got any pictures and care to share where you found it?

Yes, car is lowered. That’s a little over 24.5″ floor-to-fender all around.

item.title: By: Jake
item.dc:creator: Jake
item.description: Love your car. Have black R1 with15k miles. Just purchased. Question? Fighting with wheel tire. Is ur car lowered?? Plan drop mine at least in rear about 1.25". Wantto run r888 in 18 245 40. My rims are 8.5 so can't go to 255. 35. Want go 245 40 all way around. Thanks Jake
item.content:encoded:
Love your car. Have black R1 with15k miles. Just purchased. Question? Fighting with wheel tire. Is ur car lowered?? Plan drop mine at least in rear about 1.25″. Wantto run r888 in 18 245 40. My rims are 8.5 so can’t go to 255. 35. Want go 245 40 all way around.
Thanks
Jake
